title: Ferguson rises above adversity to stand out on football field | Sports | leadertelegram.com

Sign Up Today My Account Dashboard Profile Saved items Logout Sign Up Log In Dashboard Logout My Account Dashboard Profile Saved items Logout Site search Search Home News Sports Sports Betting News Obits Click to visit Legacy.com & view Obits Death Notices Place an Obit A & E Events calendar Promote Your Event Opinions e-Edition Magazines Newsletters Classifieds Big Book of Jobs Classifieds Employment Ads Print Ads Online Place an Ad Employment Opportunities with APG Media Public Notices Real Estate Contests Reader's Choice Awards Subscribe Help FAQs E-Edition How to Close Tay Ferguson’s love for football and dedication to the game has resulted in him having a highly successful high school gridiron career for Eau Claire Memorial.
Dennis Steinke Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Eau Claire Memorial’s Tay Ferguson runs after catching against Eau Claire North last season.
Payton Havermann Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save
Ferguson rises above adversity to stand out on football field Allan Brown Leader-Telegram sports Allan Brown Author email Sep 5, 2024 Sep 5, 2024 Updated 17 mins ago Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Tay Ferguson’s love for football and dedication to the game has resulted in him having a highly successful high school gridiron career for Eau Claire Memorial.
Dennis Steinke Eau Claire Memorial’s Tay Ferguson runs after catching against Eau Claire North last season.
Payton Havermann Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Part One. Most athletes gradually realize that adversity comes with the game. The successful ones are those who learn to deal with hardship and rise above it.
Tay Ferguson has done both.
